name: PlaneFinity
description:
Fly through a beautiful low-poly landscape as you pick up coins and deliver packages. Along the way you’ll visit far off airfields, fly past hot air balloons and airships, through rain storms and dark nights and add more planes to your collection.

Features:
* Beautiful low-poly graphics
* Weather effects
* Day/night cycle
* 20+ planes to choose from, each with it’s own flying characteristics
* Continuously changing terrain
* Challenge your friends via Game Center
* Captivating and original music
* Universal app. Play on your iPhone and iPad.
